The provincial government and the executive authorities have been given control over the treatment of TCOsIt's 10:30.0
On Tuesday, 16 January, the Pskov Regional Assembly of Deputies supported the draft law on the delineation of competence in waste management. Submitted by the Governor of Pskovregions
The Great Luk's Day Concert (6+)10:00.0
On 18 January, at 18:30, a concert will be held at the Leninsky Comsola Cultural House. The Day of Liberation of the City of the Great Luki from the German-Fashist invaders of January 1943. (6+) Entryconcerts
The snowfall added the concerns of the public services of the Great LukIt's 9:30.0
The snowfall came back to the Great Luckys. Synoptics predict that he will continue with some breaks for a minimum of two short days and have been reported to the city administration press. The air temperature will change sharply from -3 to -15 degrees Celsius.

Specialists note that eight units of equipment, including the consignor, have already left the city to fight the weather.

Early in the morning on the roads of the cityCircumstances

The great Lukas at the crossroads of Silin and Vinatovsky were crashed. Two cars were hit.

Drivers are waiting for DPS officers.
Oncologist identified the causes of cancer in young people.Yesterday 21:00.0

The Pskov Region pays a sum for the voluntary surrender of armsYesterday 8:00.0
The Pskov Region pays for the voluntary payment for the disposal of registered weapons and ammunition.

Citizens of the Russian Federation, stateless persons and foreign citizens who have attained the age of 18 who have settled in the region have the right to payment.weapons .
The risky environment awaits residents Pskov RegionYesterday 7:00.0
On the night of Wednesday, 17 January, the Pskov region is expected to freeze to -16 degrees Celsius.

Day 17 Januarysynoptics
In the Pskov Region, the list of family support measures will be expandedYesterday 18:00.0
On 16 January, an extraordinary session of the Pskov Regional Assembly of Deputies was held in Pskov. Support for motherhood and childhood was one of the themes of the discussion.

GovernorMichael Wedernikovnoted that the package of measures in force since last year would beenlarged
In the great Lukas, the former head of the Vitaly Ilushkin Psychiatric Hospital left his life.Yesterday 5:30.0
Former Chief Medical Officer, Pskov Regional Psychiatric Hospital No. 2Vitaly Ilyushkin♪

Vitaly NikolayevichHe came to work as a psychiatrist, followed by the head of the office and, since 1969, had been in charge of the hospital for almost 46 years. Actively developed the psychiatry department, skilled and trained.frames
The Pskov Region Health Committee identified the most useful productsYesterday 5:00.0
In winter, it is particularly important to use food products that help strengthen immunity. The Pskov Region Health Committee has identified a list of products that will help feed with cold health benefitsYears

info.title: The Pskov Region pays a sum for the voluntary surrender of arms
info.short_text:
The Pskov Region pays for the voluntary payment for the disposal of registered weapons and ammunition.

Citizens of the Russian Federation, stateless persons and foreign citizens who have reached the age of 18 who have lived in the region and who have given registered weapons are entitled to payment.

On 16 January, an extraordinary session of the Pskov Regional Assembly of Deputies was held in Pskov. Support for motherhood and childhood was one of the themes of the discussion.

Governor Mikhail Wedernikov noted that the package of measures in force since last year would be extended to numerals

info.title: In the great Lukas, the former head of the Vitaly Ilushkin Psychiatric Hospital left his life.
info.short_text:
Former chief doctor of the Pskov Regional Psychiatric Hospital No. 2 Vitalia Ilyushkin left his life.

Vitaly Nikolayevich came to work as a psychiatrist, then headed the office, and since 1969 he had been in charge of the hospital for almost 46 years. Actively developed a psychiatry department in the field, skilledly picking and training diapers.

info.title: The Pskov Region Health Committee identified the most useful products
info.short_text: In winter, it is particularly important to use food products that help strengthen immunity. The Pskov Region Health Committee has identified a list of products that will help to feed with good health in cold times of year.
